problems.title: Add Binary (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given two binary strings a and b, return their sum as a binary string.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
11 1

Sample Output
100

Explanation: 11 (binary) + 1 (binary) = 100 (binary).

Sample Input
1010 1011

Sample Output
10101

Explanation: 1010 (binary) + 1011 (binary) = 10101 (binary).
problems.constraints:
1 <= a.length, b.length <= 10^4
a and b consist only of '0' or '1' characters.
Each string does not contain leading zeros except for the zero itself.
hintsList: Process strings from right to left, adding digits with carry.
Use bit manipulation or string operations to handle binary addition.
